name: Dev Radar
description: Application that shows the location of developers who share the same interests, knowledge and programming languages! [Techs used: NodeJS, React, React-Native]

name: NFT ART
description: Project using PIL library (Python Image Library), a package that has many functions to manipulate images from a Python script, to create generative arts, those that are generated from an autonomous system and that nowadays do a lot success in some NFT marketplaces like OpenSea
